briefdescription.para: enumeration of all task types
enumeration of all observer types
enumeration of all cudaTask types
determines if a callable is a static task

detaileddescription.para: A static task is a callable object constructible from std::function<void()>.

briefdescription.para: determines if a callable is a dynamic task

detaileddescription.para: A dynamic task is a callable object constructible from std::function<void(Subflow&)>.

briefdescription.para: determines if a callable is a condition task

detaileddescription.para: A condition task is a callable object constructible from std::function<int()>.

memberdef.name: is_cudaflow_task_v
memberdef.initializer: = std::is_invocable_r_v<void, C, cudaFlow&> || std::is_invocable_r_v<void, C, cudaFlowCapturer&>

briefdescription.para: determines if a callable is a cudaflow task

detaileddescription.para: A cudaFlow task is a callable object constructible from std::function<void(tf::cudaFlow&)> or std::function<void(tf::cudaFlowCapturer&)>.

briefdescription.para: convert a task type to a human-readable string
overload of ostream inserter operator for cudaTask
convert an observer type to a human-readable string
queries the number of available devices
gets the current device associated with the caller thread
switches to a given device context
obtains the device property
obtains the device property
dumps the device property
queries the maximum threads per block on a device
queries the maximum x-dimension per block on a device
queries the maximum y-dimension per block on a device
queries the maximum z-dimension per block on a device
queries the maximum x-dimension per grid on a device
queries the maximum y-dimension per grid on a device
queries the maximum z-dimension per grid on a device
queries the maximum shared memory size in bytes per block on a device
queries the warp size on a device
queries the major number of compute capability of a device
queries the minor number of compute capability of a device
queries if the device supports unified addressing
queries the latest CUDA version (1000 * major + 10 * minor) supported by the driver
queries the CUDA Runtime version (1000 * major + 10 * minor)
queries the free memory (expensive call)
queries the total available memory (expensive call)
allocates memory on the given device for holding N elements of type T

detaileddescription.para: The function calls cudaMalloc to allocate N*sizeof(T) bytes of memory on the given device d and returns a pointer to the starting address of the device memory.

briefdescription.para: allocates memory on the current device associated with the caller

detaileddescription.para: The function calls cuda_malloc_device from the current device associated with the caller.

briefdescription.para: allocates shared memory for holding N elements of type T

detaileddescription.para: The function calls cudaMallocManaged to allocate N*sizeof(T) bytes of memory and returns a pointer to the starting address of the shared memory.

briefdescription.para: frees memory on the GPU device

detaileddescription.para:
T
pointer type
ptr
device pointer to memory to free
d
device context identifier
This methods call cudaFree to free the memory space pointed to by ptr using the given device context.

briefdescription.para: frees memory on the GPU device

detaileddescription.para:
T
pointer type
ptr
device pointer to memory to free
This methods call cudaFree to free the memory space pointed to by ptr using the current device context of the caller.

memberdef.argsstring: (cudaStream_t stream, void *dst, const void *src, size_t count)
memberdef.name: cuda_memcpy_async

briefdescription.para: copies data between host and device asynchronously through a stream

detaileddescription.para:
stream
stream identifier
dst
destination memory address
src
source memory address
count
size in bytes to copy
The method calls cudaMemcpyAsync with the given stream using cudaMemcpyDefault to infer the memory space of the source and the destination pointers. The memory areas may not overlap.

memberdef.argsstring: (cudaStream_t stream, void *devPtr, int value, size_t count)
memberdef.name: cuda_memset_async

briefdescription.para: initializes or sets GPU memory to the given value byte by byte

detaileddescription.para:
stream
stream identifier
devPtr
pointer to GPU mempry
value
value to set for each byte of the specified memory
count
size in bytes to set
The method calls cudaMemsetAsync with the given stream to fill the first count bytes of the memory area pointed to by devPtr with the constant byte value value.

briefdescription.para: convert a cuda_task type to a human-readable string
overload of ostream inserter operator for cudaTask
queries the maximum threads allowed per block
queries the default number of threads per block in an 1D vector of N elements
queries the version information in a string format major.minor.patch
